metadata.title: CVE-2018-16758 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Missing message authentication in the meta-protocol in Tinc VPN version1.0.34 and earlier allows a man-in-the-middle attack to disable theencryption of VPN packets.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16758` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tinc - 1.0.35-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tinc package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.35-2build1').
